title: Coleen Rooney jets to Barbados with her sons amid Rebekah Vardy war of words
text:
Coleen Rooney has jetted to Barbados with her sons amid her explosive WAG war with Rebekah Vardy.

The WAG's oldest son Kai, nine, could be seen dashing along the beach during the evening outing with his brothers, Klay, six, and Kit, three, who were occupied by building sandcastles with her father Tony McLoughlin.

The break comes amid Coleen's so-called 'WAG war' with Rebekah Vardy, after she accused the wife of Leicester City player Jamie of leaking fake stories about her to the press.

Loving it: Coleen Rooney's oldest son Kai, nine, enjoyed some fun in the sun on Friday as the family enjoyed a trip to the beach in Barbados on Friday

Kai appeared to be having a whale of a time as he prepared for a dip in the ocean during the family's beach outing.

The schoolboy dashed across the beach during the fun-filled evening, while Klay and Kit built sandcastles close by.

Tony was every inch the doting granddad as he headed into the ocean for a swim with the boys who couldn't hide their delight at heading on holiday.

Loving it: The boys were joined by doting granddad Tony McLoughlin as Klay, six, and Kit, three, frolicked on the beach

Drama: The break comes as Coleen (pictured left in June 2016) has been embroiled in a so-called WAG war with Rebekah Vardy (right in February 2019)

Messing around: Kai seemed to be having a whale of a time as he dashed along the beach after swimming in the ocean

Fun: Klay and Kit were enjoying a spot of sandcastle-building with Tony, as they headed to the beach later in the day

Nothing going on: The family were enjoying the break amid the so-called WAG war between Colee

Meanwhile Coleen has been embroiled in a so-called WAG war with Rebekah, after she accused the star of leaking stories about her to The Sun newspaper which she posted on social media.

Coleen's dramatic revelation enthralled Britain and sparked an angry denial from pregnant Rebekah, who said 'I don't need the money’ and pointed out other people have had access to her Instagram account.

Rebekah recently gave an interview with The Daily Mail, in which she insisted arguing with Coleen is akin to rowing 'with a pigeon.'

Doting: Tony was seen heading to the beach with his grandsons as they enjoyed the sun-soaked family getaway

Fun time: Kai could be seen preparing for a dive into the ocean, as he wore printed pink and purple swimming shorts for the outing

Daring dive: The schoolboy made a daring dive into the ocean after heading to the beach with his brothers and grandfather Tony

Sweet: Little Kai also looked cute in blue swimming shorts printed with elephants as he prepared for the dip in the ocean

Rebekah was pictured returning to the UK in floods of tears. The star was supported by Jamie as she returned to London's Heathrow Airport from a family trip to Dubai on Saturday.

In the emotional pictures, Rebekah is seen struggling to hide her tears as she makes her way through the busy airport hand-in-hand with husband Jamie

Sources close to Becky say leading law firm Kingsley Napley has sent Coleen a letter on her behalf demanding she provides them with the evidence she has against Becky so that she can complete her investigation.

Becky has called in a forensic team to analyse her Instagram account and identify the mole who sold fake stories to The Sun from Coleen’s Instagram account.

As part of that probe, they say, they have asked Wayne’s wife to give them the proof they have that the source must have been Becky’s Instagram account.

Adorable: Klay also wore green and blue swimming shorts covered in skulls as he enjoyed some fun on the beach
description: Coleen Rooney has jetted to Barbados with her sons amid her explosive WAG war with Rebekah Vardy.
